channel.title: Servers these days - - - - -
channel.description: Yeah ik wrong section right? idc this is most viewed section so thought i get some attention and probally a possible mute lol anyways....whats is with servers these days?? i meen serisouly?! every new server that is released is the same shit over and over again with a different name and like move dportals and npcs? its boring and we need to get more type of servers out there. 508s are a fail so 317s are our only hope but everyone keeps releasing crap! i remember back in the day when mopar servers were just out. and just regular silab. now we got all this cutom item shit and clients...im just saying the truth and my oppionion ;D

item.title: Servers these days - - - - -
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you wish to know what the story with servers these days is, ask the people who make them through PM. There is no need for a topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Servers these days - - - - -
item.dc:creator: @invalidstory invalidstory
item.description:
@invalidstory wrote:

hmm im a check it out maybe i can get permission for the use of a base every server i find is just lame

Read full topic

item.title: Servers these days - - - - -
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Look in development over 3 or 2 days and you might see a server named Berky-Scape 317 what makes your eyes pop out… No delta dude. It is going to rock!

Read full topic
